json_to_edit.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of the sea, a single beam of light becomes a beacon of hope.
json_to_edit.description: A mysterious lighthouse stands tall against the raging storm, guiding lost souls to safety.
json_to_edit.lighting: Alternating between darkness and bright flashes
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Crashing waves, howling wind, creaking wood
json_to_edit.name: Beacon of Hope
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Captain Elias mans the lighthouse during a fierce storm, guiding a struggling ship to safety.

qa.action: The lighthouse stands tall on a jagged cliff, its beam cutting through the stormy night.

hf.action: Captain Elias climbs the spiral staircase, his lantern casting eerie shadows.

tr.action: The captain tends to the massive lighthouse lens, ensuring its proper function.

xc.action: Elias's weathered hands adjust the controls, his face etched with concentration.

ka.action: A ship's silhouette appears in the distance, barely visible through the storm.

fn.action: Captain Elias frantically operates the radio, attempting to contact the struggling vessel.

af.action: The captain's eyes widen as he spots the ship veering dangerously close to the rocks.

qo.action: The ship battles against the tempest, inching closer to the safety of the lighthouse's beam.

fp.sfx_keywords: sigh of relief, wind dying down
fp.action: Captain Elias watches from the lighthouse balcony as the ship narrowly avoids disaster.

va.action: A tear of relief rolls down the captain's cheek as he realizes another soul has been saved.

edit_command: Make shots 2, 5, and 8 more intense by adding lightning strikes and increase the urgency in Captain Elias's actions.

updated_json.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of the sea, a single beam of light becomes a beacon of hope.
updated_json.description: A mysterious lighthouse stands tall against the raging storm, guiding lost souls to safety.
updated_json.lighting: Alternating between darkness and bright flashes
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Crashing waves, howling wind, creaking wood
updated_json.name: Beacon of Hope
updated_json.scene_summary: Captain Elias mans the lighthouse during a fierce storm, guiding a struggling ship to safety.

qa.action: The lighthouse stands tall on a jagged cliff, its beam cutting through the stormy night.

hf.sfx_keywords: howling wind, creaking wood, lightning strike
hf.action: Captain Elias rushes up the spiral staircase, his lantern swaying wildly as lightning illuminates the tower.

tr.action: The captain tends to the massive lighthouse lens, ensuring its proper function.

xc.action: Elias's weathered hands adjust the controls, his face etched with concentration.

ka.action: A ship's silhouette appears in the distance, illuminated by a sudden lightning flash. Captain Elias gasps and rushes to the window.

fn.action: Captain Elias frantically operates the radio, attempting to contact the struggling vessel.

af.action: The captain's eyes widen as he spots the ship veering dangerously close to the rocks.

qo.sfx_keywords: creaking metal, waves crashing, lightning strike
qo.action: The ship battles against the tempest, narrowly avoiding a lightning-struck rock as it inches closer to the safety of the lighthouse's beam. Captain Elias leans out of the tower, frantically waving a signal light.

fp.sfx_keywords: sigh of relief, wind dying down
fp.action: Captain Elias watches from the lighthouse balcony as the ship narrowly avoids disaster.

va.action: A tear of relief rolls down the captain's cheek as he realizes another soul has been saved.

label.rationale: we will update shots 2 (hf), 5 (ka), and 8 (qo) to make them more intense by adding lightning strikes and increasing the urgency in captain elias's actions. this will enhance the dramatic tension of the scene and emphasize the perilous situation. we'll modify the action descriptions and add lightning to the sfx_keywords for these shots.
